Habitat pressures from aquaculture production.

In this script we use the seafood watch data on the habitat criteria per species and multiply by production.

Habitat scores for each farmed species is criteria 3 in the Seafood Watch data. Each species get a score 0-10 with 10 being the least concern and 0 being high/critical.
